snippet: The Chicago Cubs hired Rick Renteria as their manager. He was given a three-year contract, with club options for 2017 and 2018. The terms were not disclosed.
abstract: Chicago Cubs hire Rick Renteria as their manager; he is given a three-year contract, with club options for 2017 and 2018; terms are not disclosed.
lead_paragraph: The Chicago Cubs hired Rick Renteria as their manager. He was given a three-year contract, with club options for 2017 and 2018. The terms were not disclosed.
